719425f-a.title: Manhattan: East Broadway - Montgomery Street
719425f-a.text:
East Broadway, west from Montgomery Street, showing a
Derspective along the north side of this thoroughfare.
In the background is the municipal center at City Hall
Park distinguished by the tall structures there. Blend-
ing together are the Municipal Building, the Woolworth
Tower and the slightly lower Transportation Building.
These overshadow the latticed approach to the Manhattan
Bridge. On the left is the building housing the Jewish
Daily Forward.
1939
Beecher Ogden, photo
Museum Photographers Assn.
Grand Central Terminal

719424f-a.title: Manhattan: East Broadway - Montgomery Street
719424f-a.text:
East Broadway, north side, west from but not including Montgomery
Street, to but not including Clinton Street.
June 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
